name: Hungry Hound
description:
Get your paws ready because it’s time to snatch as many snacks as you can while your owners are distracted during Christmas dinner!

Are you ready to test your skills in this casual game? Pound your paws and get ready to steal some dinner!

Controls:

  1. Beat the clock and snatch all the snacks
  2. Left & Right arrow keys = Navigate around the scene and move the dog by using the arrow keys
  3. Spacebar = Jump up and snatch as many snacks as you can while your owners are distracted
